Django Holding Page

Launch a quick viral holding page to notify people when you launch.

{% block content %} {% endblock content %}

Where am I?

Django Holding Page collects names and email addresses that can be exported as a CSV, ready for import in to Campaign Monitor. This page is for demonstration purposes only!

If you've checked out this project then well done - it's running! Now customise the templates and you're ready to go!

Learn more on GitHub.
